Group an epi_df object by default keys

Source: R/methods-epi_df.R
group_epi_df.Rd

Group an epi_df object by default keys

Usage

group_epi_df(x, exclude = character())

Arguments

x

an epi_df

exclude

character vector of column names to exclude from grouping

Value

a grouped epi_df
